Are all of these supported in bmcweb?

Remote syslog protocol is supported.
I removed unnecessary ones, sorry for misunderstanding.
Done
What is the difference from this one and https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/webui-vue/+/70045  ?
Don't understand why, but in 700045 build was failed. I just recreated merge request.

Please abandon one. 
Please retrigger vs submitting a new PR

Where is this hardcoded in bmcweb?
https://github.com/openbmc/bmcweb/blob/5575efb61318a29b810b841390dce5b80cbeacfb/redfish-core/lib/event_service.hpp#L630

Yes, it's not hardcoded in bmcweb but I'll check again.
May be I missed something
 If you have an example how it's need to done, please, share.
Done
Can we add the error messages to these validations?
Done
We are able to submit only by adding protocol, I think this would not be expected,We maybe want to keep ip and port required?
We can set any default value, and it will be always not empty.
Still unaddressed comments. Is all this support in bmcweb?
I think it should be "Send test message". also, On click of this button, it is better to have a toast message.
Okay, I'll add toast message.
Done
I see it as Sent test message, I think it should be "Send test message" in the button
Supports only ipv4 ?
